item.title: Samantha add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "Like all weak men he laid an exaggerated stress on not changing one's mind." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Wilkie Collins
item.description: "She was unlike most girls of her age, in this--that she had ideas of her own." -- Wilkie Collins

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I say, beware of all enterprises that require new clothes, and not rather a new wearer of clothes." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Every generation laughs at the old fashions, but follows religiously the new." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "You must suffer me to go my own dark way." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "Whether I shall turn out to be the hero of my own life, or whether that station will be held by anybody else, these pages must show." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Human nature needs more lessons than a weekly sermon can convey." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Michel de Montaigne
item.description: "The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to oneself." -- Michel de Montaigne

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Miguel de Cervantes
item.description: "...you are a king by your own fireside, as much as any monarch on his throne." -- Miguel de Cervantes

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Samantha add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I cannot fix on the hour, or the spot, or the look or the words, which laid the foundation. It is too long ago. I was in the middle before I knew that I had begun." -- Jane Austen
